page.title: 17WOOLOW FARM
page.content: Woolow Farm is 100 years old and{ {they rent 150 acres of land which {belongs to ICI.}Their main produce is{ milk and they own 65 milking cows which are milked twice a day in a five-a-side milking parlour. Their animals are kept in all the time in sheds in winter. Farming is quite difficult in winter because of the steep hill and of the road blocks on the A6. The farm supplies the milk marketing board.They are in a farming union and have been in the business all their lives. Their working times are{6am_11pm}and they don't employ anyone.{Friends and {family help them.}The farm produces{ {200 gallons of milk a day.}The farmer's daughter's main hobby is showing the bulls in competitions. They have at least 7 buildings on the farm all used for different purposes.
